org.irri.iric.portal

Class AppContextHardcoded

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.irri.iric.portal.AppContextHardcoded

  • public class AppContextHardcoded
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides application-wide access to the Spring ApplicationContext. The ApplicationContext is injected by the class "ApplicationContextProvider".
    Author:
    Siegfried Bolz

      • checkBean

        public static java.lang.Object checkBean(java.lang.Object obj,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Utility to check if object is null (if autowired worked!) if null, use SpringUtil.getBean(name); then AppContext.getApplicationContext().getBean(name); then throw exception !

        obj - object to check
        name - bean name
